page.title: 01The Floral Town Of Nantwich.
page.content: Nantwich is a pleasant place to live with plenty of things to see and do.It is very pretty because of all the flowers and the black and white buildings.In Spring and Summer all the gardens,roads and buildings have beautiful flowers decorating them because Nantwich is one of Britain's {floral towns. The old{black and white}buildings and the church in the square are now surrounded by modern paved areas that make the centre traffic-free.There is a new indoor swimming pool and also an outdoor natural{brine bath,}possibly the only one of its kind in the country.The people of Nantwich are very friendly,and those born in the town are known as 'Dabbers'.All this and the surrounding{landscape}make it a delightful place to live or visit.
